about_the_game:
Hurricanes are raging in Sunland! Once again, Stephen Shepard leads an Emergency Crew to help people in their hour of need and get to the bottom of what's going on. The concrete jungle and the ruined sunny city meet them not at all cordially, the hurricane caused significant damage. The heroes will not stop at obstacles and will go to the end to save every single life. But how soon will they realize that what's happening in Sunland is just the tip of the iceberg?

Embark on a heroic journey to different parts of the world and save people! Exciting missions to eliminate the consequences of various disasters in an exciting casual strategy Emergency Crew 2 are waiting for you. A huge number of unique missions, 50 levels, an addictive story about a team of heroes from our time, and situations that only real rescuers can handle - all this is waiting for you right now! Rescue people, rebuild destroyed cities, fight marauders and wild animals, and manage the resources you need wisely. Remember - time is valuable!

Functional controls and understandable instructions will help you easily understand the basics of the game.
"Emergency Crew 2" - save people from disaster!

- Natural disasters - earthquakes, floodings, fires, tsunami.
- Team of professionals: rescuers, firefighters, paramedics, police officers, rangers!
- Unique special equipment: emergency vehicles, boats and helicopters.
- Thoughtful plot, colorful comics and characters, each with its own mood!
- Production chains capable of producing the highly advanced resources!
- 50 unique levels.
- 5 locations of the rescue operation: Suncity, flooded eastern island, rainforest, savannah and Coastland city!
- Over 25 hours of exciting gameplay for any age.
